page.title: 14SIGNIFICANT DEVELOPMENTS(2)
page.content: In terms of the economy of the area the most significant developments were seen to be-1.Increasing unemployment. 2.Closure of mines,factories and the Consett steelworks.3.The miners strike of 1984-85.4.The decision of the Nissan car company to come to nearby Sunderland.This has awakened hopes for offshoot industries.5.Factory and workshop developments at Abbey Road. In terms of environmental improvement the most significant events were seen as-1.The massive funding given to reclamation projects.2.The recognition given to Durham Cathedral as one of the most outstanding buildings in the world.This brought hope for more jobs through tourism.3.Pedestrianisation of the centre of Durham City.
